span.span: Home » District » About our District » COVID-19 Information

div.p: This page is continually being updated. Please check back for the latest information.

p.br: April 10, 2020 – Dr. Price addressing the district with his weekly update.
April 5, 2020 – Dr. Price gives some shoutouts and talks about spring break that starts Monday!
March 28, 2020 – Dr. Price gives some shoutouts and talks about spring break.

hr.p: March 21, 2020 – Dr. Price addresses the Hardin Northern community and gives out some shout outs!
March 18, 2020 – Dr. Price addressing the Hardin Northern community about the current situation we are facing as a school district.

td.a: Press Release - 3/13/2020 Student Events & Meal Options

tr.td:
Spectrum is offering free internet services for families for 2 months and waiving the $14.95 install fee for homes where our students live. Parents or guardians need to make the call using one of the following phone numbers:
1-855-261-7300 or 1-855-243-8892
